EmailTemplate.name: 09-20-22 P&N Allpoint Webinar Invite Reminder.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! You’re invited: Leveraging Low-Cost Distribution to Compete in a Changing Landscape
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, The banking industry continues to experience radical disruption as fintechs, neo-banks and new payments organizations march deeper into the market. How do credit unions compete effectively in this environment? How do you retain your members and acquire more? How do you keep them as close as possible when it’s becoming easier to move accounts or use the services of a new contender? Once lacking a physical presence, more and more of the new wave of upstarts are joining surcharge-free networks to connect with their customers. Don’t get left behind. How? By providing your members with access to an independent surcharge-free ATM network that extends your service delivery through cash out AND cash in kiosks coast-to-coast. What’s more? With a neutral network, you won’t be sending your members to another credit union’s ATMs. Key takeaways: - New insight into the rapid changes occurring in the banking landscape - How to meet and beat the new competitive challenges - How an independent surcharge-free ATM network can help you gain a competitive edge ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> See you there, Allpoint Network Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
